text:
That was the worst thing about this game and it can happen numerous times throughout. I got stuck in the last dungeon simply because I couldn't get anymore AP/SP (don't remember well) so I couldn't make any aciton when fighting the terribly hard final bosses.
But you're right, its art and music direction are top notch.

author: Sephiko

text:
I played the game back in 2001 or so but never finished it. I don't know if my memory is fuzzy but I think I was on small boat and I had to fight monsters or a boss, and I﻿ had saved right before that and I was basically stuck right before the fight without being able to do anything else. I couldn't beat the boss and I had no way to level up.

The game had awesome graphics though, and great music by Hamauzu for his first big fully composed game. I easily drift to this track.
author: SupraDarky
